interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

bibl.title: 2 Timothy (Peshitta version)
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܦܘܠܘܣ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܕܬܪ̈ܬܝܢ
2 Tim
2 Timothy
ܐܶܓܰܪܬܳܐ ܕܦܰܘܠܳܘܣ ܕܰܠܘܳܬ ܛܺܝܡܳܬܶܐܳܘܣ ܕܬܰܪܬܶܝܢ
ܫܠܡ̣ܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ ܕܗܘ̣ܐ ܐܦܣܩܘܦܐ ܩܕܡܝܐ ܒܥܕܬܐ ܕܐܦܣܘܣ. ܕܐܬܟ̣ܬܒܬ݂ ܡܢ ܪܗܘܡܐ. ܟܕ ܙܒ̣ܢܬܐ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ ܩܡ ܦܘܠܘܣ ܩܕܡ ܢܐܪܘܢ ܩܣܪ. ܘܐܫ̣ܬܕܪܬ݂ ܒܝܕ ܠܘܩܐ ܬܠܡܝܕܗ. ܕܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬܓܡ̈ܐ ܡܐܬܝܢ ܘܬܠܬܝ̣ܢ ܘܫܬܐ .ܘ:ܘ.
The Epistle of 2 Timothy, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠܡܬ. ܐܓܪܬܐ. ܕܠܘܬ. ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ. ܕܬܪܬܝܢ. ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ. ܡܢ. ܪܗܘܡܐ. ܘܗܘܝܐ. ܡܐܐ܀ ܘܬܪܥܣܪ. ܦ̈ܬܓܡܝܢ. ܘ:ܘ.
2 Timothy, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of 2 Timothy
ܐܓ݁ܪܬ݁ܐ ܕ݂ܠܘܬ݂ ܛܝܡܬ݂ܐܘܣ ܕ݁ܬ݂ܪ̈ܬ݁ܝܢ
ܐܶܓ݁ܰܪܬ݁ܳܐ ܕ݂ܰܠܘܳܬ݂ ܛܺܝܡܳܬ݂ܶܐܘܳܣ ܕ݁ܬ݂ܰܪ̈ܬ݁ܶܝܢ
The Second Epistle to Timothy
bibl.note: 2 Timothy (Peshitta version) is extant as early as the 5th-6th century and consistently circulates as one of the Pauline Epistles (Peshitta version) .
ܦܿܘܠܘܣ ܫܠܝܚܐ ܕܿܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ܂ ܒܿܨܒܼܝܢܗ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ܂ ܘܒܼܡܘܼܠܟܿܢܐ ܕܿܚܝܐ̈ ܕܿܒܼܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ܃
